string.text: Attention everyone… Cronies, don’t pry into the block post… Some jerks have attacked the patrol… All in all it’s really hot there… They’ll send dragoons for sure.

Recently courier Barman with the goods has been taken on the block post… All in all tasty morsel is the box with the artifacts, lies somewhere at commander’s… So, if the life bothers someone – one can risk.
Attention everyone. To the north from the bridge on the outpost, in about 100 meters over the forsaken APC stumbled on the gathering of “Electras”… Who finds this info useful owes me a beer.
People, the militaries have resumed the patrol under the broken bridge on the outpost. Their sniper has also hidden there… didn’t manage to find out where exactly – had to scarper from there…
Copy everyone… Bandits have settled at the factory again. Taking off bribes off the stalkers… Someone near there, intimidate those freaks… I won’t be in debt.
To the east form the bridge saw the pack of dogs on the outpost – about 20-30 men:)… So, make your conclusions, gentlemen…
Messrs stalkers… Need “Night star” promptly… I pay decent bread… It is said that there is one remaining on the outpost since the last emission…
…Vasya says that there is one labeled appeared, just left the merchant. You know what to do…
Somebody has shot Fedya Cherniy at the garage… Sense those bandits here again.

Don’t butt into the Black Valley, zombies are streaming from there, crowds of them… Don’t waste the bullets, damn. It’s been a long time since we had to clear the valley. What a hell is Duty looking at?
It seems that I’ve just seen several soldiers from Duty. I wonder, whom did they come for?
…I’m feeling badly, mates, it got me. If someone is near the rusty lake now, give a hand, I won’t stay in debt… All in all I’ll try to get out of here myself, then we’ll see.
Sniper returned! I’ve just heard from the ables… Returned from the very center! It seems that we’ll make a damn good breach to the center soon, there we’ll see who is who…
Three men settled in the garage… Be cautious, it seems that these convicts came again with the old.
I’m at the Dump, the place is crowded with blind dogs… It seems that new troops came from the center, be cautious everyone.
Show caution everyone. Militaries have established here for a long time. Their base is in institute building. I’ve seen several tens of people and sniper on the roof.
I’ve heard from the patrol conversations, that the militaries gather all they’ve found at the 2nd floor of the Institute’s building. If there are willing to risk for the gain – try to get through.
